file.name: BMRS_API.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
tags:
  - name: Transmission
    description: Data relating to the infrastructure on and management of the transmission network
    externalDocs:
      url: https://www.bmreports.com/bmrs/?q=transmission/
  - name: Demand
    description: Data relating to forecasts, out-turn, and reductions in demand
    externalDocs:
      url: https://www.bmreports.com/bmrs/?q=demand/
  - name: Generation
    description: Data relating to forecasts, out-turn, and reductions in generation 
    externalDocs:
      url: https://www.bmreports.com/bmrs/?q=generation/
  - name: Balancing
    description: Data relating to the prices, volumes, and units operating in short-term power markets
    externalDocs:
      url: hhttps://www.bmreports.com/bmrs/?q=balancing/
info:
  title: "BMRS API"
  description: "API for the Elexon Balancing Mechanism Reporting Service"
  version: "2.0"
servers:
  - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"
paths:
  /BMRS/B0610/v1:
    get:
      x-title: "B0610"
      description: "Actual Total Load per Bidding Zone"
      tags:
        - Demand
      parameters:
        - name: "APIKey"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "AP8DA23"
        - name: "SettlementDate"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "2021-01-01"
        - name: "Period"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "*"
        - name: "ServiceType"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          examples:
            csv:
              value: "csv"
            xml:
              value: "xml"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Actual Total Load per Bidding Zone"
      servers:
        - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"
    servers:
      - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"
    
  /BMRS/B0620/v1:
    get:
      x-title: "B0620"
      description: "Day-Ahead Total Load Forecast per Bidding Zone"
      tags:
        - Demand
      parameters:
        - name: "APIKey"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "AP8DA23"
        - name: "SettlementDate"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "2021-01-01"
        - name: "Period"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "*"
        - name: "ServiceType"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          examples:
            csv:
              value: "csv"
            xml:
              value: "xml"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: "Day-Ahead Total Load Forecast per Bidding Zone"
      servers:
        - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"
    servers:
      - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"
    
  /BMRS/B0630/v1:
    get:
      x-title: "B0630"
      description: "Week-Ahead Total Load Forecast per Bidding Zone"
      tags:
        - Demand
      parameters:
        - name: "APIKey"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "AP8DA23"
        - name: "Year"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          example: "2021"
        - name: "Week"
          in: "query"

          example: "22"
        - name: "ServiceType"
          in: "query"
          schema:
            type: "string"
          examples:
            csv:

            xml:

      responses:

      servers:
        - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"
    servers:
      - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"

    servers:
      - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"

    servers:
      - url: "https://api.bmreports.com"

        - name: "StartDate"
